This is where I tend to get confused.

Misty said the ghost modulates?=A0 B=
ut I've also heard it said it is not the noise, but the words, that the gho=
sts select from the broadcasts?=A0=A0 And some people say that it is someth=
ing more ephrmeral, that every hears differently because it has t to be mea=
nt for each individual.

Could someone set me straight here?=A0 Maybe Frank=
 S?=A0

I think that the only positive I could see 
out of manual swe=
ep is that you will have a natural=A0irregularness to the 
speed at which y=
ou sweep.
=A0
Correct me if I am wrong, but I don't think 
that manual swee=
ping means you=A0search for words necessarily. I mean the aim 
should be th=
e same as automatic sweep=A0in that you just turn the knob back 
and forth =
without reason.
=A0
April

      I'm not =
sure I understand the theory behind the manual 
        sweeps - maybe you =
can help?

I thought the idea behind the 
        electronic (franks box) s=
weeps is that the entities are the ones 
        selecting the proper frequ=
encies at the proper time containing the 
        relevant words they want =
to express.=A0 Is that true?

If so, 
        then doesn't the manual sweep=
 completely override that process, since it 
        is you that is turning=
 the knob, and just looking for words you 
        personally think are rel=
evant?

        =
  
          
            
            
              
                With=
 the RS hacks they are basically just opening the case 
                car=
efully and cutting the mute wire or pulling out the mute pin 
             =
   depending which=A0radio it is. Check the archives for 
                d=
escriptions for each model. RS updated some versions of the 
              =
  radios so they were no longer able to be modified. Steve Hultay 
        =
        went on to try it on a few other radios and got some good 
        =
        results. 
                =A0
                You can also do a man=
ual sweep with a radio that has a 
                knob/dial or a scan func=
tion that doesnt jump the stations too 
                quickly by simply s=
canning across the band. This method works 
                great.
        =
        =A0
                Misty
